DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect simultaneous surface electrocardiogram ( ECG ) record Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy ( CRT ) intracardiac electrogram ( IEGM ) recording variation electrical synchrony .
DOC.criteria: Already implant SJM Quadripolar CRT Pacing System Ability provide inform consent study participation Willing comply study evaluation requirement At least 18 year age Resting ventricular rate > 100 bpm Intrinsic PR interval > 300 m Paroxysmal persistent atrial tachycardia atrial fibrillation document Pregnant plan become pregnant study
